content: {A失落}Even though we've got ore here, wildflowers, and everyone else, during these few days without you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, even the wind on the mountain tops has seemed a little down.

content: Yesterday, I was talking to the ore that I put out in the sun to sunbathe, and I said, "I haven't seen <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style> for ages"! You had me worried! Where have you been...?
